document.full_text: the outlook for britain's prized triple-a credit rating remains stable but weaker growth and slippage in the government's fiscal plans could lead to a reassessment, credit ratings agency moody's said on wednesday.
document.title: moody's uk rating at risk if growth, austerity slip
lines_and_colors: the outlook for britain's prized triple-a credit rating remains stable but weaker growth and slippage in the government's fiscal plans could lead to a reassessment, credit ratings agency moody's said on wednesday.
